about.title: About LEGT
about.subtitle: Your Valorant companion
about.whatIsDesc: LEGT is a free Valorant stats tracker that lets you look up any player's profile, rank progression, match history, and performance analytics. Simply search by Riot ID to get started.
about.featureRankDesc: Track rank and RR progress across seasons
about.featureStatsDesc: K/D, ACS, ADR, headshot %, agent and map performance
about.featureMatchesDesc: Detailed match history with full 10-player scoreboards
about.dataSourceDesc: LEGT uses the HenrikDev unofficial Valorant API to retrieve player data. All data is publicly available and sourced from Riot Games' in-game systems. We do not store personal information beyond what is needed to display profiles.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Track your Valorant stats in 3 easy steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Enter any player's Riot ID (Name#Tag) in the search bar. Select the correct region and hit search.
howItWorks.step2Desc: See the player's rank, rating, top agents, map performance, and overall stats at a glance.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Dive into individual matches with full 10-player scoreboards, K/D/A, ACS, damage, and more.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: LEGT is a free, web-based Valorant profile tracker. It allows you to search any player by their Riot ID and view their rank, stats, match history, and performance analytics.
faq.a2: Yes, LEGT is completely free. There are no premium tiers or hidden costs.
faq.a3: The data comes directly from Riot Games' systems via the HenrikDev API. Stats are as accurate as the game's own data, though there may be a short delay before recent matches appear.
faq.q4: Why can't I find a player?
faq.a4: Make sure you're entering the exact Riot ID with the correct capitalization (e.g., Player#NA1). The player also needs to have played at least one recent match for their data to be available.
faq.q5: How often does the data update?
faq.a5: Match data typically appears within a few minutes after a game ends. Rank information updates in near real-time.
faq.a6: We do not collect personal information. All data shown on LEGT is publicly available through the Valorant API. We use cookies only for language preferences.
faq.a7: LEGT supports all Valorant regions: Europe, North America, Asia Pacific, Korea, Latin America, and Brazil.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.infoCollectedDesc: LEGT collects minimal data to provide its services. We do not require user registration. When you search for a player, we query public Valorant API data. We store language preferences via cookies on your browser.
privacy.howWeUseDesc: The information retrieved is used solely to display player profiles, stats, and match history. We do not sell, share, or monetize any user data.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use a single cookie (NEXT_LOCALE) to remember your language preference. No tracking cookies or third-party analytics cookies are used.
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We use the HenrikDev API to retrieve Valorant game data and valorant-api.com for game assets (agent icons, rank icons, map images). These services have their own privacy policies.
privacy.dataRetentionDesc: We do not permanently store player data. All game data is cached temporarily in memory for performance (typically 2-10 minutes) and then discarded.
privacy.yourRightsDesc: Since we do not collect personal data or require accounts, there is no personal data to request, modify, or delete. Your recent searches are stored locally in your browser and can be cleared at any time.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please reach out through our community channels.
